entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
